column4: hey guys i'm trying to compile a firefox addon from it's tar ball and i need libxul to do that successfully the problem is i can't find it in synaptic where can i get the libxul package
i'm trying to compile a firefox addon from it's tar ball and i need libxul to do that successfully the problem is i can't find it in synaptic where can i get the libxul package
don't repeat your question over and over :)
also, libxul, sounds like it should already be installed
since firefox requires xulrunner
i know but it is'nt
have you tried sudo apt-get install libxul ?
yeah it says unable to locate package libxul
are you using a makefile to compile it?
yup
pastebin it
there you go man http://pastebin.com/Tx6AYVSr
try installing libxul-dev
or libxul-common actually
either one will probably work
E: Unable to locate package libxul-common
what version of ubuntu?
not sure but I think it might not be available in that version
hmm well thanks anyways man
you can always try making libxul from source as well
